A modern, feature-rich control panel that extends Pterodactyl with advanced user management, plan-based access control, and integrated payment systems.

## âœ¨ Key Features

- ğŸš€ **Server Management** - Create, edit, and manage Pterodactyl servers
- ğŸ‘¥ **User Management** - Advanced roles, permissions, and premium badges
- ğŸ’³ **Payment Integration** - PayPal processing with automatic plan activation
- ğŸ¯ **Plan System** - Subscription-based access control for eggs and locations
- ğŸ”’ **Security** - JWT authentication, rate limiting, and audit logging
- ğŸ¨ **Modern UI** - Beautiful, responsive design with Tailwind CSS

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/pterodash.git
cd pterodash

# Backend setup
cd backend && npm install
cp .env.example .env
# Edit .env with your configuration
npm start

# Frontend setup (in another terminal)
cd frontend-v2 && npm install
cp .env.local.example .env.local
npm run dev
```

## ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack

- **Frontend**: Next.js 15, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Mongoose
- **Authentication**: JWT, bcrypt
- **Payments**: PayPal API
- **Integration**: Pterodactyl Panel API
- **Validation**: Zod schemas
- **Security**: Helmet, CORS, rate limiting

## ğŸŒŸ What Makes PteroDash Special?

- **Plan-Based Access**: Users can only access resources based on their subscription tier
- **Premium Recognition**: Automatic golden badges for premium users

- **Integrated Payments**: Seamless PayPal integration with webhooks
- **Audit Trail**: Comprehensive logging of all user actions
